work.name: Department of Computer Science, University of Sheffield
work.summary: Research Associate on the EPSRC COVERT Grant exploring ''Safe and secure COncurrent programming for adVancEd aRchiTectures'' (PI's Prof. John Derrick & Dr. Andrei Popescu), a joint project with the University of Surrey and University of Kent

work.name: Boeing | PhantomWorks International
work.summary: PhantomWorks in Boeing's international advanced prototyping division. Additionally completed a Systems Engineering course and the Boeing Australia Graduate program, and was a part of the STEM Outreach program.

work.name: Boeing | PhantomWorks International
work.summary: Developed a prototype for an augmented reality system.

work.name: RGB Assurance
work.summary: RGB Assurance is an engineering consultancy firm specialising in software development, testing, and verification for safety critical systems.

education.summary: Completed thesis titled 'Formal Combinatorial Structures and Proof Techniques in Isabelle/HOL'. Supervised by Prof. Lawrence C.Paulson, Funded by a Cambridge Australia Scholarship and the Department of Computer Science.

Achieved first class honours and a University Medal, Class of 2017 Future Leader, UQ EAIT Scholar. Completed a highly commended honours thesis ("A Model Instantiation of a Rely-Guarantee Algebra") supervised by Dr Larissa Meinicke and Prof Ian Hayes. Studied abroad for a semester at the University of Edinburgh
Practical examination in music performance and general knowledge to be recognised as an Associate in Music, Australia.

volunteer.summary: Responsible for leading a group of 23 student volunteers to support the 800-person graduate student community. Previously Sports and Societies officer 2021/22
Robogals is an international not-for-profit aiming to inspire, engage, and empower young women into STEM careers.
The local branch of Robogals for the University of Queensland.
Actively involved in many parts of the university community
highlights: Student Mentor for the UQ Young Scholars Program (2016 - 2017)
